TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsExplicitlyDereferenced extends System.Object
public ref class IsExplicitlyDereferenced abstract sealed

summary.span: 指示托管指针表示某方法签名内的指针参数。

span.span: Indicates that a managed pointer represents a pointer parameter within a method signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 c + +，托管的指针和托管的引用将发送到元数据作为指针。In C++, managed pointers and managed references are emitted into metadata as pointers. 若要区分两种类型的元数据中，Microsoft c + + 编译器应用于此修饰符托管指针。To distinguish between the two types in metadata, the Microsoft C++ compiler applies this modifier to managed pointers. 它会发出任何修饰符上托管的引用类型。It emits no modifier on managed reference types. 编译器需要知道正确的调用语法从元数据范围内导入方法时。Compilers need to know the correct calling syntax when importing a method from metadata scope. 类和其伙伴类中，消除歧义的指针参数中的引用参数。The class and its partner, the class, disambiguate reference parameters from pointer parameters. 编译器发出元数据更改，在实时 (JIT) 编译器处理值时的默认行为是不适当的方式中的自定义修饰符。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到了一个自定义修饰符时，它处理修饰符指定的方法中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以将自定义修饰符应用于方法、 参数和返回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需的修饰符，但可以忽略可选的修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 可以将自定义修饰符发出到元数据中使用以下方法之一：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法如类， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成包含对的调用的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令文件`modopt`和`modreq`，并组合成与文件[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管的反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何发出使用反射的程序集的对象。The following example demonstrates how to emit an object into an assembly using reflection. [!code-cpp[Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]
